data.title: Interview with Wilfried Martens (Brussels, 19 May 2010) — Excerpt: the EPP and the Austrian government alliance between the ÖVP and the FPÖ
meta_keywords: 19 may 2010) — excerpt: the epp and the austrian government alliance between the övp and the fpö
data.meta_description: In this interview excerpt, Wilfried Martens, Belgian Prime Minister from 1979 to March 1981 and December 1981 to 1992 and President of the European People’s Party (EPP) since 1990, discusses the lively debates within the EPP on the possible exclusion of the Austrian People’s Party (ÖVP) of Chancellor Wolfgang Schüssel, which was accused of joining forces with the Austrian Liberal Party (FPÖ) of populist Jörg Haider to form a government.
